feed.title: Homer Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Homer: v24.11.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • added the missing leading slash.md by @DarkenLight in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/801
  • Tag use --highlight-secondary background if not set bulma classes by @Canti23 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/824
  • Ping service timeout by @Canti23 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/825

New Contributors

  • @DarkenLight made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/801

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v24.11.3...v24.11.4

entry.title: New release for Homer: v24.11.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • Ping service now support custom success code definition by @bastienwirtz in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/commit/721a8c2e66c4e98c303826bd6ab344de5c1e3ba8.
  • PeaNUT custom service by @Canti23 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/826
  • Fix param for demo showcase by @Canti23 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/835
  • Add Gitea custom service by @meonkeys in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/833
  • Glances service improvements by @mq1 & @bastienwirtz in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/807 and https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/837

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v24.11.4...v24.11.5

entry.title: New release for Homer: v24.12.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • Add Traefik, Wallabag, Olivetin by @meonkeys in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/838
  • add Gitea subtitle fallback and dummy data by @meonkeys in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/839

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v24.11.5...v24.12.1

entry.title: New release for Homer: v25.02.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • Fix link for smart cards in demo app by @kubistika in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/845
  • Update MEALIE customservices.md by @j-antunes in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/841
  • Add docuseal by @meonkeys in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/851
  • Fix "Get Started" link by @l0f3n in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/854
  • Add update interval to Ping smartcard by @maxnetyaga in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/861
  • feat(cards): add multi link support by @bastienwirtz in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/865

New Contributors

  • @kubistika made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/845
  • @j-antunes made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/841
  • @l0f3n made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/854
  • @maxnetyaga made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/861

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v24.12.1...v25.02.1

entry.title: New release for Homer: v25.02.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • Snappier container healthchecks by @tanasegabriel in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/856
  • disable cache for Docuseal fetch by @meonkeys in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/866
  • Fix #858 add labels to docker image by @molhamalnasr in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/859
  • Added interval to update status for the *arrs & Tautulli by @mbentley in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/556

New Contributors

  • @tanasegabriel made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/856
  • @molhamalnasr made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/859

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v25.02.1...v25.02.2
